name: LinkMed
overview: LinkMed AB is a venture capital firm specializing in investments in early venture to commercialization and development capital. The firm prefers to invest in biotechnology, life science, and medical technology companies with products in all stages ranging from early stage to phase I and phase II clinical studies, and on the market. It seeks to invest in unlisted companies based in Sweden but does also consider investments in other Nordic countries like Denmark, Finland, and Norway. The firm typically invests between SEK 5 million ($608,788) and SEK 20 million ($2.43 million) in its portfolio companies. It prefers to exit by means of sale, initial public offering, or dividends. The firm prefers to own between 20 percent and 49 percent stake and seeks Board participation in its portfolio companies. LinkMed AB was founded in 1998 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

acquisitions.source_description: LinkMed Completes Purchase of Olerup SSP
